title: (x) Family Feud western-style title - various similar {gang}
content:
I know, I know - glamorous, isn't it?  
Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150222133115im_/http:/typophile.com/files/S7_C.jpg)
author: letsgobuffs

comments.content:
Hehe, chester.

I don't think this is a digital font, but you might like [Cottonwood](http://web.archive.org/web/20150222133115/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=C.424.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=FAMILY+FEUD&sampleSize=48) or [PL Davison Americana](http://web.archive.org/web/20150222133115/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=C.106286.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=SURVEY+SAYS&sampleSize=32).

Another font with the same flavor is [De Louisville](http://web.archive.org/web/20150222133115/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sentinel/de-louisville/regular/). (Free for personal use; $20 for commercial use)

I know this is 'closed' but hey ;) - an even better match if not the one is Frisian, which used to be distributed via FontBank.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150222133115im_/http:/typophile.com/files/frisian.png)
